name: Unsuspected Murders
description:
Story

Right now there is no big story. You are just a police crime scene investigator solving murders in different places.

How to play

You spawn near the murder scene and from there, you simply just need to look for irregularyties in the enviroment around you, by going over to objects and pressing "E".

The Journal

When you play through our game you will find objects which unlocks different choices for who commited murder, why and with what. You can see what you figured out in the journal. When you feel like you have enough evidence you click "Solve Murder" where you pick between things you figured out. Afterwards you get shown whether you were wrong or right.

The journal also contains some hints and information about the victim and the objects you find.

Puzzles

In the game there are some puzzles. The puzzles lead to evidence, which then helps you solve the murders.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Fast Walk: Shift

Crouch: CTRL

Interact: E or LMB

Rotate: RMB down

Journal: J or MMB

Game in development

The prototype version "The House Murder" is free to play.

The first level is completable. However, you may come across some unrefined elements.

The full game will contain more levels/maps, like a garden, church, factory and more. Our game is a crime scene puzzle solving game at heart, so it's mainly about finding evidence on crime scenes.

For now, the game/Demo is only gonna be available for Windows.

To launch the game you need to unpack the file and click on the (Unsuspected Murders.exe)
